name: cotton candy Neopets
css: @namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml); @-moz-document domain("neopets.com") { BODY {background-color:#FFDCFF !important;} A:Link, A:Visited {color:#BCCEE2 !important;} A:Hover {color:#FFBAD2!important;} #main {border-color:#FFBCFF !important;} #header { background-color:#FFBAD2 !important; background-image:url("http://i63.tinypic.com/2pzy1hw.jpg") !important;} #footer { background-color:#FFDCFF!important; background-image:url("http://i63.tinypic.com/2pzy1hw.jpg") !important;} ul.dropdown { border:1px solid #FFBAD2 !important; background-color:#FFBAD2 !important;} LI:hover UL.dropdown A, LI.over UL.dropdown A {color:#000000 !important;} LI:hover UL.dropdown A:Hover, LI.over UL.dropdown A:hover {color:#BCCEE2!important;} .eventIcon, .user {color: #000000 !important;} .eventIcon A:Link, .eventIcon A:Hover, .eventIcon A:Visited, .user A:Link, .user A:Hover, .user A:Visited {color:#BCCEE2 !important;} #nst {color: #000000 !important;} .sidebar, .neofriendUsername, .blistSmall div{background-color:#FFBAD2 !important} .sidebarModule, .contentModule {border: 2px solid #FEAFFF !important;} .sidebarTable td, .contentModuleTable td{border-color:#FFBCFF !important;} .sidebarTable, .contentModuleTable {border: 2px solid #FFBAD2 !important;} .sidebarHeader { background-color:#BCCEE2 !important; border-bottom: 2px solid #FFBAD2 !important; color: #FFFFFF !important;} .sidebarHeader A:Link, .sidebarHeader A:Hover, .sidebarHeader A:Visited{color:#FFBAD2 !important;} .contentModuleHeader, .contentModuleHeaderAlt { background-color: #FFBAD2!important; color:#BCFFE2 !important;} .contentModuleHeader A:Link, .contentModuleHeader A:Hover, .contentModuleHeader A:Visited, .contentModuleHeaderAlt A:Link, .contentModuleHeaderAlt A:Hover, .contentModuleHeaderAlt A:Visited { color: #D5E8FE !important;} .moreLink, .moreLinkAlt { border: 1px solid #BCFFE2 !important;} .footerForm {color: #000000 !important;} .copyright, .copyright A:Link, .copyright A:Hover, .copyright A:Visited {color: #000000 !important} #ban, .footerNifty {display:none !important} .marqueeSlot, .marqueeSlot A:Link, .marqueeSlot A:Hover, .marqueeSlot A:Visited { background-color:#BCFFE2!important; color: #FFFFFF !important;} .marqueeSlotOn, .marqueeSlotOn A:Link, .marqueeSlotOn A:Hover, .marqueeSlotOn A:Visited { background-color:#FFDCFF !important; color: #FFFFFF !important;} }
